title: Omnicom Group 's revenue 2006 to 2018
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Revenue in billion U.S. dollars, containing a total of 13 data points.
Overall Revenue in billion U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.
Revenue in billion U.S. dollars is slightly increasing from 2006 to 2007, slightly decreasing from 2007 to 2009, slightly increasing from 2009 to 2011, and lastly roughly constant from 2011 to 2018.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2008 and 2009.
Maximum Revenue in billion U.S. dollars, about 15.42 was reported at Year 2016
Minimum Revenue in billion U.S. dollars about 11.38 was reached at Year 2006
